Maps service names to their deployment information.

getServiceEntries

public static java.util.List getServiceEntries()
Returns a list of AeServiceDeploymentInfo entries currently deployed in the engine.

addServiceData

public void addServiceData(IAeServiceDeploymentInfo[] aServiceData)
Adds the service data to our cache. This is called when a plan is deployed by the deployment handler. The handler is synchronized already so we don't need to worry about synchronizing here.

Parameters:
aServiceData -

getServiceData

public IAeServiceDeploymentInfo getServiceData(java.lang.String aServiceName)
Gets the service data mapped to the service name

Parameters:
aServiceName -

processUndeployed

public void processUndeployed(javax.xml.namespace.QName aProcessQName)
Called by the deployment provider when a plan is undeployed. The plans get undeployed through the deployment handler which is already synchronized.

Parameters:
aProcessQName -
